unit: Unit 6 | Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions
title: Disney Princesses Put to the Test
question_text: Ava loves all of the Disney princesses, but her favorite is Elsa, from the movie Frozen . She thinks everyone should love Elsa, and she just can't let it go! Ava wants to survey a large sample of young girls and ask them to vote for their favorite princess from the following list: Ariel Belle Elsa Jasmine Mulan Ava believes that $40\%$ of young girls would choose Elsa. What type of significance test should she conduct in order to test this theory?

choices.text: A z z -test for a difference in proportions.
χ 2 χ 2 test for goodness of fit.
